org.mitre.provenance.services

Class ServiceUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.provenance.services.ServiceUtility

  • public class ServiceUtility
extends Object
    This class provides utility methods as helpers for other service implementations.

    moxious

      • OK_ExecuteQuery

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response OK_ExecuteQuery(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                                        String cypherQuery,
                                                        String nodeColumn)
                                                 throws PLUSException
        Execute a simple cypher query that returns *ONLY* a list of nodes, and craft a response based on the query results.
        Parameters:
        req - the request object
        cypherQuery - the query to execute
        nodeColumn - the name of the column that the query will result in, which contains the node information
        Returns:
        a JSON response of the query results.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

      • suggestFormat

        public static PLUSSerializer.Format suggestFormat(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Examine the "format" parameter, and the "Accept" header to guess at which representation is best for return. Options:
        text/turtle or format=ttl: PROV-TTL
        application/rdf+xml or format=rdf: PROV-RDF
        application/provenance+xml or format=xml: PROV-XML
        json or format=json: D3 JSON
        Default: D3 JSON
        Parameters:
        req - an original request
        Returns:
        suggested format for the response to a given request

      • formatToMediaType

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType formatToMediaType(PLUSSerializer.Format fmt)

      • OK

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response OK(ProvenanceCollection col,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Convenience function for returning HTTP OK response, with variable representation format depending on user request.
        Parameters:
        col - the collection
        req - the request
        Returns:
        an OK response containing a serialized collection

      • OK

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response OK(ProvenanceCollection col)
        Convenience function for returning an HTTP OK response, with the D3 formatted JSON results from a provenance collection. If you want the response type to depend on the paramters of the request, then see alternative methods.
        Parameters:
        col -
        Returns:
        an application/json response containing D3-JSON
        See Also:
        OK(ProvenanceCollection, HttpServletRequest)

      • OK

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response OK(com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndFeed feed)
                                    throws com.sun.syndication.io.FeedException
        Convenience function for serializing a feed as rss/xml and returning an OK response.
        Parameters:
        feed -
        Returns:
        an OK response containing an RSS/XML feed.
        Throws:
        com.sun.syndication.io.FeedException
